text: Iceman is a 1984 American science fiction drama movie directed by Fred Schepisi and starring Timothy Hutton, Lindsay Crouse, John Lone, Josef Sommer, David Strathairn, Philip Akin, Danny Glover. It was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1984 science fiction movies Category:1984 drama movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:1980s American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Fred Schepisi Category:Universal Pictures movies
title: Iceman (1984 movie)
